title: Toggl Plugin
description: Track time you spend per project using the Toggl API Plugin!
longDescription: Do you want to track how long you spend in a project? Are you a freelancer tracking time spent on a project? But are excel sheets pecky to work with or sometimes even forget to press "start" or "stop" on timing software or just don't want to press anything at all? Then this is the plugin for you! Introducing the Toggl Plugin, using the Toggl API, you can now track time right from in the engine and specify workspace, client, project and task name and automatically or manually track time with the click of a few buttons. The plugin can automatically take care of starting and stopping when booting the project so you don't have to worry about starting and stopping every time you want to work on the project. Forum thread: forums.unrealengine.com/showthread.php?134820-Toggl-plugin-for-Unreal-Engine-Track-time-spent-on-projects-and-clients
technicalDetails: List of Features: Auto login on launching a project(config) Auto starting the timer when you launch a project(config) Automatically add missed time when accidentally stopping the timer manually(config) Adding new clients Adding new projects Selecting client Selecting project Selecting workspace Setting task description Saving or discarding API key Login with API key Storing last used settings Starting timer Stopping timer Network Replicated: No Supported Development Platforms: w64 Supported Target Build Platforms: w64 Documentation Included: Yes - forums.unrealengine.com/showthread.php?134820-Toggl-plugin-for-Unreal-Engine-Track-time-spent-on-projects-and-clients Twitter: https://twitter.com/PandaDevStudios Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/PandaDevStudios/ Forum thread: https://forums.unrealengine.com/showthread.php?134820-Toggl-plugin-for-Unreal-Engine-Track-time-spent-on-projects-and-clients! Website: https://panda-studios.net/wp/
